name: Uphold Europe
goal:
Uphold Europe is a migration management focused pressure group founded as a response to the manifested inability of European leaders to agree on a common, sustainable and efficient solution for the European migration management crisis.

We work on four main policy areas: the Schengen System, the European External Border, the Asylum System, and the Economy of Migration
interests: Borders and Security, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
euInitiatives: European Blue Directive, Reform of the European Asylum System, Dublin Regulation, EU-Turkey deal, Schegen Agreement, EBCG
